title: Of prelatical episcopacy, and vvhither it may be deduc'd from the apostolical times by vertue of those testimonies which are alledg'd to that purpose in some late treatises one whereof goes under the name of Iames, Arch-bishop of Armagh.
author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R.O. & G.D. for Thomas Underhill...,
